title: "Japan's Mitsui to begin self-driving truck transport business"
excerpt: "TOKYO -- Japanese trading house Mitsui & Co. will launch a logistics business using self-driving trucks as early as 2026, Nikkei has learned. The move comes as Japan amended a law in April, allowing level-4 autonomous vehicles to operate on public roads."
